amendment.description: To clarify that an authorization to use military force, a declaration of war, or any similar authority shall not authorize the detention without charge or trial of a citizen or lawful permanent resident of the United States.

action.text: Amendment SA 3018 proposed by Senator Feinstein.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3018 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 29. Record Vote Number: 213.
